title: 服务器报错，求助大佬！

replies.author: linbo10
replies.txt_content: 如果一直都报错，考虑换一个核心文件

replies.author: Kazg
replies.txt_content: 是不是下了高级成就插件？

replies.author: dszl
replies.txt_content:
x99520555 发表于 2019-5-23 15:20
是不是下了高级成就插件？
没有啊，没下过什么高级成就的插件啊

replies.author: Kazg
replies.txt_content: 但是你这个好像是插件出问题报错了va.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: org/bukkit/event/player/PlayerAchievementAwardedEvent  achiecementawardedevent看看插件里有这个没有

replies.author: lingxy19031
replies.txt_content:
Encountered an unexpected exception
java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: org/bukkit/event/player/PlayerAchievementAwardedEvent复制代码java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: org.bukkit.event.player.PlayerAchievementAwardedEvent复制代码Caused by: java.lang.OutOfMemoryError: GC overhead limit exceeded复制代码
请检查achiecementawardedevent的版本/配置/前置是否有问题
然后内存多分配一点试试看

replies.author: 帕帕武
replies.txt_content:
Caused by: java.lang.OutOfMemoryError: GC overhead limit exceeded
此处Out Of Memory表示内存溢出
调高游戏内存可以解决
